TRANSLATION: (1) Indeed, We sent it [i.e., the Qur’ān] down during the Night of Decree.
(2) And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

ARABIC_TEXT: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
TRANSLATION: (3) The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

ARABIC_TEXT: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ
TRANSLATION: (4) The angels and the Spirit [i.e., Gabriel] descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.[1955]
FOOTNOTES: [1955]- Bringing the exact measures apportioned for everything by Allāh in the course of the coming year.

TRANSLATION: (5) Peace it is[1956] until the emergence of dawn.
